title: X-Men: Fatal Attractions
description: Magneto, a man embittered by loss. Avalon, a world created for the survival of his chosen people, mutants, sworn to follow a madman's lead. Charles Xavier, the most powerful mind on earth, whose Dream for peaceful co-existence between humans and mutants may be the earth's last hope. Wolverine the berserker mutant whose adamantium skeleton may be the very thing that destroys him. X-Men! X-Force! X-Factor! And Excalibur! Still reeling from the death of one of their own - they now face their greatest enemy in a battle that could mean the end of the world!Collects X-Factor #92, X-Force #25, Uncanny X-Men #304, X-Men #25, Wolverine #75 and Excalibur #71.
author: Scott Lobdell
